data.name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
data.detailed_description:
This game is a casual and entertaining game where players will experience the surprise of the microscopic world under a unique perspective. You can freely control the speed of the roller coaster, so that you can stop to admire the scenery carefully at the same time as the high-speed excitement.

About this game:

Microscopic view unique experience
The familiar office has a different experience under the microscopic view. The small details that you normally don't notice are shown in front of you in a magnified way. It allows you to view a different landscape.


Beauty is enjoying her relaxing time. Let's have a closer look at her.




The whole city has just started its busy day. The cold streets and tall buildings of the city have a sense of being in a steel jungle. The few flickering lights add to the feeling of solitude.


New York at sunset is a different kind of beauty. In the sunset alone flying between the buildings, watching the scenery at the moment.

Instructions:

The left controller: UI interactions; the menu button for menu, the trigger button for selection.
Right controller: touchpad up for acceleration; touchpad down for deceleration.

You can freely control the speed of the roller coaster, so that you can stop to admire the scenery carefully at the same time as the high-speed excitement.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
